column5: ive looked everywhere.princess auto - crappy tire no luck. i need wheel assembly that is 4.80 x 8 or even 4.80 x 10 but the hub diameter must measure 3"1/4 across.  all wheels i find measure 2"3/4 which is too small for my hub.
try Cerka industries in milton they may have or can get what you need and good pricing. http://www.cerka.ca/
